TopicTitle: How do you get more than one kerbalnaut on an EVA at a time?

Articles.Content:
Since one cannot save with a Kerbalnaut on the surface (and if you switch vessels, the kerbalnaut dissappears), how can this be done. People have definitely done it in 0.16...

I checked on the version history page (the new wiki), and it doesn't mention anything about EVA kerbals being non-persistent...
Try rotating through ships and Kerbalnauts in the immediate area with the "[" and "]" keys
